title: (x) Basic Soul Unit "Deep Blue" album cover - ITC Benguiat, hand lettered {Nick Cooke}
content:
hi there  
i’m interested in finding this gem i’ve seen in a record cover  
(the blue one), it seems like pretty old,  
anyone knows what’s the name? and if you have the date it’ll be good too  
thanks in advance

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [678.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20070125111233/http:/typophile.com/files/678.jpg) | 8.84 KB |
author: jahcoozi

comments.content:
Basic Soul Unit is Benguiat Book.

Deep Blue is probably hand lettered.

Nick Cooke
ok, thanks, so which might be the font on which it was hand lettered?

I’d guess that something like Bodoni Poster was a starting point before the heart-shaped ‘cutouts’ were added.

- Mike Yanega

thanks a lot ill try those ones  
appreciated
